website_summaries.verdict: The Crock-Pot Cook & Carry Digital Slow Cooker delivers all of the low-maintenance cooking performance we expect from a slow cooker, with a few nods to convenience and portability that give it an edge over its competitors.
pros: Crock-Pot keeps the cooking aspect simple with the Cook & Carry Digital Slow Cooker, and usability tweaks like a locking lid and a thermometer vent add some bonus convenience
cons: It kept food warm while it was unplugged, but it was close enough to the food-safety red zone that you'll still want to keep tabs via a separate thermometer

customer_reviews.title: The Best crockpot ever!
customer_reviews.text: I searched tons of crock-pot models looking to replace my broken crockpot. The problem I was having in the stores was locating one that did not have the "high/low setting" and instead had the button where you could select the hours "4hr/6hr/8hr/10hr". Trusty amazon pulled through with this beauty! I love the temperature gauge at the bottom and the travel lock handles. I've never used those specfic features yet as I haven't traveled with it so I can't comment on how well it's insulated and all that fun stuff. But the cooking countdown is awesome. I never thought I'd care, but it's nice to know how much time is left if you get home earlier than you think! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: CleverAlias

customer_reviews.title: It cooked the food just right.
customer_reviews.text: Some wrote in their review that it got hot on the outside. Yes, it does but I expected it to. You don’t need to touch it so it isn’t a big deal to me. I really like it and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and returned because I need a 6 qt crock ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed and returned because I need a 6 qt crock pot to cook up to 6 qts. but this crock pot holds less than 5 qts. When I talked to the company, they told me it is the housing until that holds 6 qts... REALLY...you can't cook in the housing unit. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a good sized crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent decision for a first crock. It's super easy to use and everything that goes in turns out beautifully. I've put bone in hams, whole chickens, all cuts of pork and beef, and they all cook divinely. The stoneware cleans easily by hand (no dishwasher to test that) and the lid has held the seal. I've noticed a bit of condensation under the top handle after washing, but it doesn't seem to have effected anything else yet. The size makes it really easy to make food for days with just two people in the house. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Poor attention to detail at the factory.
customer_reviews.text: We had to order a second cooker because the arrangement of the unit in the original box allowed the exterior of the crock and the interior of the heating housing to rub against one another. This removed coating from the crock and gouged the interior of the heating unit. The second cooker had exactly the same problem except that it was more severely damaged. We will not purchase another crock-pot until the method of original boxing is corrected. We are now looking at other brands.
customer_reviews.author: NJenn

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice so far and both times were a real success. Just remember that all day long water is dripping back into the bowl so if you wanted something that isn't 'boiled', not the perfect choice. Everything came out tender and falling apart and the carrots and potatoes in one dish were perfect. For the next one I've gotten a nice roast and am going to try the Campbell's packets and see what a pot roast turns out like with that. Great value for the price and it has the temp gauge and seveal different settings, including a keep warm one and it should travel nicely for those who do that.
customer_reviews.author: Hodad

customer_reviews.title: The perfect traveling Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry, locking lid (and we know that is a needed feature) And it lets you know how warm the food is from the time you unplug and replug it once you get to the event. Best Potluck Crockpot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Brake

customer_reviews.title: Only for some recipes
customer_reviews.text: The options don’t allow for any but the most basic recipes unless you’re willing to babysit the crockpot to stop it or restart it to get the right amount of time. I didn’t understand how limited it was when I purchased it, having never owned a slow cooker, and I would return and replace it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: The Crock that offers more than you might need
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these as Chrsistmas gifts for family members. it is basically the typical crock pot with a few additional features: a locking lid (which CANNOT be in the locked position while the unit is on...), this feature is strictly for transporting only (a bit useless, actually); the inside edge of the lid is rubberized so it fits securely and provides a nice seal and the display, shows the temperature. All in all a nice product. A bit pricey, considering without the locking lid and elaborate display would typically be 1/3rd of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Newindie2009

customer_reviews.title: Love this crock pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my crock pot. I have used it several times. The only complaint I have is a common one I have seen in other reviews on Amazon and elsewhere. One of my lid clamps does not stay up, so it can fall down when I move the lid around. But it is a minor inconvenience. When I have the lid locked, the clamp stays in place. My previous crock pot did not display the time remaining. that is a feature I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: DaBoujibo

customer_reviews.title: The lid stinks...literally
customer_reviews.text: I like the Crock-Pot, but I'm only giving it two stars because the gasket on the lid retains the odors of everything I've cooked in it. I've tried scrubbing it and soaking it in vinegar, and it just stinks. I've contacted the company, and they haven't answered. There you go.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very few choices, does not cook at a very high temperature.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this crock pot. The time and temperature are inter-related, so I cannot set it to cook at my desired temp for my desired time. The hottest setting does not get very hot. I had beef stew in it. After several hours, the potatoes and carrots were not done. The only things I like about it are the removable crock (which most slow cookers have) and the locking lid. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Low setting is too hot.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in January 2014 and have used it 3 times. Cooking on Low is my usual routine. Each time after approximately 2 hours, everything is bubbling on the Low setting. Cooked a roast yesterday and had to finish cooking it on Warm setting, so I assume the Warm setting is too high also. Tried to return the unit but I'm told I cannot do it as the cut-off date to return this item was Feb. 16, 2014. I have used a Crock-Pot slow cooker for 40+ years and have never had a problem except for this one. I don't plan to use this Crock-Pot again as it just cooks too hot! Does anyone have any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mims

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I purchased this crock that it has preset times and one can only use those... You do NOT get to set your own times with this thing! The settings are High 4 hours, high 6 hours, low 8 hours, and low 10 hours. STUPID. What if I want low for six hours, which is very frequent for me to want?
customer_reviews.author: ruby chimera

customer_reviews.title: It Came with a Damaged Top!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived fully packaged from Amazon, but one of the side clamps had broken and the plastic was in pieces when we pulled it out of the box. It would be a lot of trouble to have to mail the whole item back because of it. Boo! The redeeming factor was the Crock-Pot company. After a call, they more than compensated us. We got another appliance and didn't have to mail them the original one. Yay for Crock-Pot!
customer_reviews.author: JETAMT

customer_reviews.title: A great crockpot
customer_reviews.text: All I needed was the ceramic liner because it had slipped off the counter and broke after I washed it. It was cheaper to purchase a brand new crockpot than to purchase a replacement ceramic liner. I am very happy with this purchase. I like the versatility of the dials on this cooker. It does a good job with everything I cook in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Nana

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first modern crock pot. I cooked my first meal with it 2 days ago. Very easy controls. Fasten down lid was a nice option when transporting it. I have spilled cheese dip in my car before which you never get rid of that smell. Meal turned out great and the warming option is nice. I work long days and am recently single. It's nice to still come home to a hot home cooked meal.
customer_reviews.author: Independant

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great like usual and cross shipped another one with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it showed up with a broken foot. Amazon was great like usual and cross shipped another one with no problems. The second one came and has been working like a champ for 6-7 months. Heats well and mostly even. The edges do get hotter than the center, but most of the slow cookers I have used do the same. Being able to lock the lid down for transporting is a really nice feature and has saved us more than one accidental spill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two features I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a crockpot that would both allow me to carry it in the car without spilling and to work all day and not come home to burned food. This model does both! I can fill the pot and carry it with me -- without having to clean the carpets when I come home. No more chili on the seats! And, if I'm delayed and don't make it home when the recipe says I should -- this pot keeps the food warm, without burning. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Pernilla

customer_reviews.title: It's good enough for most things but i'd like to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. I was hoping for more control than the timer gives you. You can do one of two time intervals at low, or one of two time variables at high before it kicks to warm. It's good enough for most things but i'd like to be able to delay start, and specify exactly how long i'd like it to go before kicking to warm.
customer_reviews.author: zorg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: My other crock-pot broke after 11 years, this one is basically the updated model. But the locking mechanism is really nice, also seems like I will be less likely to get burned on this one. I have only had it for a little while, probably used it about 8 times and no problems yet. It would be nice to have a little more program-ability, but it's the same set up as the old one so I'm used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: as usual the packaging from amazon was fast and good. was disappointed however, when we opened the box and actually took a look a the crock pot. We are returning for a larger size but if you are considering this product, make sure you are aware that the actual cooking surface pot is smaller than 6 qts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a bad meal made in this excellent machine. It cooks so throughly and the juices and aroma that starts coming out after a few hours of cooking will temp you to open the lid before its done. I have cooked ribs, whole chicken, porkchops etc and all have come out better than expected. The warming feature is perfect for those with a busy lifestyle (pretty much everyone) because your food is kept warm and ready when you come home from work. There are other pots out there but spend the money for this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: dpm99

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my daughter's family since she is a working mom and can't always put together healthy meals in the short time valuable after work. She especially liked the locking lid that prevents spills when she takes dishes to events or gatherings. She wishes she had the one with the programmable start time!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Dinner When You Are
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot was a value and met my expectations. Prepared a delicious roast for the family and looking forward to many future easily prepared meals. The handles are sturdy and the controls easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: MackDaddy of All Crock Pots
customer_reviews.text: Of all the crock pots I have owned this is the best one by far. It holds a large amount of food and switches to warm on its on. I love that I can clip the lid on and travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great crock pot but the temperature indicator stop working
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot performs its function and we have made fantastic dishes. I like the locking lid as this has allowed us to show up to parties with some crock pot favorites and not have to worry about transportation. The only reason I removed a star is because the temperature indicator stopped working after the first use. I did not exchange it as it performed everything else well.
customer_reviews.author: NanoOX

customer_reviews.title: Great Crock-Pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a bigger pot to cook meats in. It arrived promptly and I immediately cooked a pot roast. The item heats well and cooks quickly and thoroughly. Its great that I can put some food in it, leave it overnight or while I'm out and hours later its ready and servable.
customer_reviews.author: S Squared

customer_reviews.title: Nice Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my "dutch blue" and white ancient crockpot that had seen better days. This one seems to cook at a much higher temperature so take that into consideration. I also like the spill resistant feature on the cover. Easy to clean and has a nice digital control on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Phelps NY Chick

customer_reviews.title: I love my crock pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my crock pot! Anytime family or friends come over I get compliments on it and asking where I got it! AMAZON!!! And the plastic liners are fantastic and prevent messy clean ups!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Now You're Cookin.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for the wife....she has another one given to her last year, but was smaller and was not programmable. She wanted one that could be programmed so as to prevent overcooking of the meal. She has used it many times since Christmas and really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: LookN4ABargain

customer_reviews.title: Smart design and has the features we wanted, plus locks down for travel ease
customer_reviews.text: Our old crock pot finally died. After searching and comparing, we decided on this one. We are glad we did. It has all the features we wanted and it is big enough to hold a roast large enough for our family of 7! Plus it locks down for traveling!!!! Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Central Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - Amazon is buying FAULTY Crock-pots that probably did not pass inspection and re-selling. I opened mine and the bottom heat sensor was broken. Clearly visible and should not have passed an inspection. CRAZY dangerous to plug in. Now I have to box this junk up and send it back. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM - STAY AWAY, looks like they re-selling junk the manufacturer sold at a discount.......STAY AWAY.....the bottom heat sensor is bent
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: ... crock pot twice since it arrived and am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this crock pot twice since it arrived and am very pleased with it. One thing I especially like is having the ability to stop cooking if I think the food is done and switch over to the warm setting. The temperature gauge is also very helpful when taking to pot lucks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Momma's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Makes life a whole lot easier once in awhile. Throw some ingredients into the slow cooker, go to work, and voila (if i spelled that right), Dinner is ready when you get home. Get yourself a slow cooker cook book to go with it,
customer_reviews.author: mimithompson21

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: The product works good. There are only four different timer & heating conditions. Low 8hr & 10hr. High 4hr & 6hr. It's just that I found the better product (Crock-Pot brand) for cheaper price (less than $40) at Costco later. I'm too lazy to return so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: AkaShiro

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED...IT DOES NOT EVEN WORK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself as a birthday present (rec'd an Amazon gift card). My bday is in April and I have never used it until now. Would you believe the thing does NOT work. I am so disappointed because I thought this was a top of the line brand and top of the line owners.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R. Yarboro

customer_reviews.title: cool crock
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet but it seems like it will work nicely. That being said, I didn't give it 5 stars because when it arrived two of the legs were broken. Return wasn't an option so I chose to repair it myself. Kinda frustrating when it's brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Danner

customer_reviews.title: These would be perfect if it had an all day low setting
customer_reviews.text: These would be perfect if it had an all day low setting. Makes it hard to keep a pot of beans or stew on the oven all day because of the cut off. Otherwise it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great meals
customer_reviews.text: Easy to figure out and we've had some great meals from it. I've never used any other crockpots before so I can't compare it to any others but as a first time crockpot user I found this one really nice, easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: MSH

customer_reviews.title: Great start to July 4th.
customer_reviews.text: Used Crock-pot once. Today would have been the second time except it doesn't work from plugging it in. Come on! One use appliance? I needed it today of course.
customer_reviews.author: Ambre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and inexpensive crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent crockpot. It's easy to operate. I'm a big fan of the digital display that tells you the remaining cook time. The locking lids and its ability to regulate temperature when unplugged are also handy features when I take the crockpot on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, but the recipient says she loves it and uses it almost every week. Good heating, good capacity. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: You need one of these
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying a crock pot and I have to say I am very pleased with my decision. Crock pot sccpcts605-s is the best purchase I have made, when I opened the box I was very impressed with the looks, quality, design, weight, and over all pot itself. I would definitely recommend this to others. This is very easy to use!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: james dettrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a medium size crock pot for occasional cooking. I am not experienced in the kitchen and this is easy to use, easy to clean and comes with clear instructions. It was packaged nicely and I have had no problems with it thus far. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: QueenOndine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So nice to be able to set the timer and walk away. My previous slow cooker over cooked things and the pot it self. Love the stoneware pot. I haven't traveled with it yet but really like the latches to close the lid and the area to wrap the cord. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic crock pot! Use it at least once a week, the settings work perfectly and I trust it to be on in my house while I'm out for 12 hours. The auto shut off feature is great, once the time is up it has a warming feature that ensures your food won't be over cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Crock-Pot
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these, and love both of them. Convenient settings, and love the fact that it goes to warm when the initial cooking is done. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a larger Crock-Pot.
customer_reviews.author: FunBacon

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good controls.
customer_reviews.text: I like having the feet at the edge of the crockpot, it makes it seem sturdier. The lid and clamping mechanism seems kinda flimsy. For the price it should have come with the insulated carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Knowitall

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I wish it did not get so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I wish it did not get so hot on the outside, but that is my only negative. Everything about it is good!
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful crockpot
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a great crockpot. The heat settings work well. It is terrific that you can seal the top tightly and travel with the pot without spills.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good Crock-Pot, easy to use, and we can put a large roast with vegetables in it for dinner and left overs. Cooks evenly, has a warmer button. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This Crock-Pot is probably larger than I need; however, I don't have to worry that the meat I am cooking is so large that the lid won't fit. I like the timing device, and I especially like the lid and the way it fits. The gasket keeps moisture from escaping down the sides and into the bottom of the cooking unit. Very nice appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Kiester

customer_reviews.title: but it was easily returned to
customer_reviews.text: feet were defective upon arrival, but it was easily returned to Walmart
customer_reviews.author: John Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 4 times and it has performed as it should. It looks great as an appliance. It was a little smaller at the base than my old one but it was taller in height.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Nakano

customer_reviews.title: cooks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed: Timer, secure lid for carrying, cooks great!
customer_reviews.author: DJacobs

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great Initially, but Ceramic Crock Cracked and Mildewed after 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crock pot in March 2013. I have no complaints about its performance. However, after two years microfractures developed in the coating of the ceramic pot on the inside and outside. I keep the pot stored in a cabinet with the vent hole open and the lid locked down. When I pulled it down to use it, there was white, black and brown mold growing in these microfractures. Yuck! I don't trust it. It's beyond my warranty so there is nothing I can do about it, and as a replacement crock costs more than the unit ($69), I won't be going that route. Neither will I purchase this crock again.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ebeling

customer_reviews.title: No more spills when carrying food to get togethers!
customer_reviews.text: The locking lid is the best thing ever! We have had spill related drama with our old crock pot. No more! My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and product as advertised. Excellent crock pot and tbe handles with seal is great for no spills moving around
customer_reviews.author: Techn0

customer_reviews.title: Boiled peanuts
customer_reviews.text: We use this thing to boil peanuts. It will hold two bags of raw peanuts. You will need to put it on two sessions of 6 hrs each, but really so easy.
customer_reviews.author: jeepster54

customer_reviews.title: Works great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great as expected. I definitely use the programmable feature of it, which is very simple to manage. I would definitely recommend this crock pot!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Somerville

customer_reviews.title: Only way to cook!
customer_reviews.text: Since I received this my family ONLY wants me to cook using this! Easy delicious every time! Never had any issues. Best way to have a healthy home cooked meal
customer_reviews.author: Photo Happy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is easy to lock and travel with you with no spills and mess.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Crock-Pot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crock-pot. You can use it with set times, or code in your own recipe time. I haven't taken the time to figure how to code in the amount of time yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice slow cooker. I love the locking lid for travel and the cook settings are adequate for most types of food.
customer_reviews.author: Ray98

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this crock pot. so much easier to take to potluck without having to worry about spilling
customer_reviews.author: gailann

customer_reviews.title: reliable and trouble free
customer_reviews.text: My spouse loves this unit, uses it all the time for parties. I was dubious about the reliability of its lcd programming but it's been fine.
customer_reviews.author: road_warrior

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. It started smoking and now won't turn back on. Didn't use it within one month of purchase so I now can't return it. VERY DISAPPOINTED with this product.
customer_reviews.author: A Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this crockpot, especially automatically switching to warm; however, it burns just about everything I put in it. I wish I had realized this sooner so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Norris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good crockpot, heats well and even. Lid secures tightly for transporting.
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great crock pot. Nice size. Heats well. Travels well too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Love Hate
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking crock pot. It does work and I'e had no problems with it. BUT... I used to have a Crock Pot brand one and the temperatures are very different. I like that is has a keep warm setting but I'd compare that to low as a setting instead and the Low as high on this brand. The high is good if you are in a hurry and to me that is not what a crock pot is all about. But now that I know this, I will prepare my food accordingly and next time will go back to the brand I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product arrived in perfect condition made the best pot ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product arrived in perfect condition made the best pot roast ever
customer_reviews.author: joan redman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet.. but it is exactly what I hoped for. Love the catches on the lid to prevent spills. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jmcjh

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: After i unpacked it to check for damage, I realized I should get one for me as this was a present. low price, great quality, fast shipping, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: jjtec

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my sister and she loves it ... It's a good one ... It make life a little easy at dinner time
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crock pot is great. The feature that keeps the food warm after cook time is over is great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: First recipe I made was Pulled Pork BBQ Sliders in this bad boy and they came out AMAZING! The Pork shoulder was slowly cooked over a period of 8 hours and when the time came to take the bone out the meat just fell right off. It was delicious and the Crock Pot is perfect to latch the top on and bring to parties!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD CROCK POT
customer_reviews.text: Finally after several tries from Crock-Pot, I have a crock pot that the lid does not dance around and liquids splatter while the food is cooking. This one cooks great and it actually counts down the remaining hours or minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Toosweet25

customer_reviews.title: Given as gift
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my daughter in her first apartment. She loves it and is making great use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo0826

customer_reviews.title: Slow and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The hour selections are fine for me. Holds a lot of food. 5min cutting and throwing stuff in, then walk away.
customer_reviews.author: LBrown

customer_reviews.title: Good crock pot, but not truly programmable
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the cooking itself, but am disappointed that I couldn't program it; have to choose one of their program settings.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife and she loves it and it also holds more than her old one great product
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: It cooks at a really high temperature. I like to put dinner in the crock pot before work, but the the 8 hours on low is WAY too long for most foods. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: louie29

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my daughter. She likes ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter. She likes the fact that she can start her evening meal before she goes to work.
customer_reviews.author: GmKat

customer_reviews.title: I like this crock-pot very much.
customer_reviews.text: This crock-pot is great, cooking is very good, and in less time. I would like to see a larger size, maybe 71/2 quarts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harris

customer_reviews.title: great crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this crock pot to replace my old one. I love the fact that it has different setting as opposed to just low and high. the lid lock is great for traveling. all at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: amalia andazola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great crockpot for a great price. Eating healthy is so much easier with a crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes meals simple, I just need to use it more often!
customer_reviews.author: SMRC

customer_reviews.title: everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I use a crock pot often on busy days at our house and this one has been perfect. It shows the amount of cook time that has passed, it can be set on "warm" and additionally it has latches that hold the lid down tight for no-mess transportation. I would buy it again -- I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Hampton

customer_reviews.title: CROCK-POT
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to use. Liked the glass lid with the handle, rubber seal around it, two carrying handles, the cooking temperature controls and the thingie to wrap the cord around. The manufacturer thought of everything to make this crock-pot the best if not one of the best. Liked the price too. Liked the speedy processing, packaging and the delivery of my order. It came in time before the event where I plan to bring something that's going to be kept warm in a very classy container!
customer_reviews.author: TBW

customer_reviews.title: Crock Pot
customer_reviews.text: This crock is very nice. I do most of my cooking in it and so far I have not been dissapointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: katw

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I've always had Hamilton Beach and loved them
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I've always had Hamilton Beach and loved them. First time I cooked in it was taking it somewhere, leaked-does not seal. Timer is set for exact hours, not adjustable. Low setting is set for either 6 or 8 hours. Low also seems to cook too hot. Just wish I had never bought this Crock Pot.
customer_reviews.author: wlinla

customer_reviews.title: works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It works great, I do wish that it had 6 hours on low somethings get well done if you use the 8 hour setting. As I am a stay at home granny, I simply turn it off at 6 hours..
customer_reviews.author: dyann chase

customer_reviews.title: Crock-Pot SCCPCTS605-S
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded this slow cooker for increased capacity (4qt to 6qt) and programmable cooking time. I have used it once and the product performs adequately. The reason to take away a star is not enough flexibility of cooking time: it offers only two options (8hours and 10hours) for slow cooking.
customer_reviews.author: S. More

customer_reviews.title: Poor seal.
customer_reviews.text: Cover must be placed exact or steam leaks. Poor seal.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and large size for larger portions at one time!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Donnesa McPherson

customer_reviews.title: worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Keep food warm. Easy to use. You won't regret. Lock in place. Cleaning made easy. Easy transport. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: lulumom

customer_reviews.title: BUT I LOVE WHAT I SEE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A CHRISTMAS PRESENT, BUT I LOVE WHAT I SEE!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Everything I was looking for in a crook pot.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: Crock-Pot SCCPCTS605-S Cook Travel Serve 6-Quart Programmable Slow Cooker
product_meta.description:
YOUR MEAL STAYS HOT WHEN YOU GO OUT
 The SCCPCTS605-S 6-quart Programmable Cook & Carry Slow Cooker with HeatSaver™ Stoneware is the ultimate for on-the-go convenience. Designed with all the great portability features of the Cook ‘N Carry line, this model also uses special heat-retaining stoneware and temperature gauge so prepared foods stay warmer longer and ready to “serve on arrival.” Perfect for potluck dinners, tailgating, get-togethers and holiday parties. 

FEATURES
 * Keep the heat in with HeatSaver™ stoneware to help maintain an ideal serving temperature 
 * Temperature gauge shows you when it’s time to plug unit back in for additional warming
 * Easy-to-use locking lid featuring lid gasket provides extra seal for less mess on-the-go 
 * Programmable pre-set digital controls 
 * Shifts to warm setting automatically once the cook time is complete
 * 6-quart capacity is perfect for 7 or more people or a 6-pound roast 
 * Removable, dishwasher-safe oval stoneware 
 * Convenient cord storage

THE ULTIMATE IN PORTABILITY
HeatSaver stoneware keeps food hot up to 30% longer* than other portable slow cookers. Specially-designed HeatSaver™ stoneware maintains an optimal serving temperature--with or without a power source--keeping food hotter up to 30% longer* than existing portable slow cookers.

Digital control panel with travel temperature gauge. Click here for a larger image The slow cooker features a temperature gauge that shows the temperature of food in the stoneware once the unit has been unplugged. The gauge indicator points to the red "hot" section, then over time moves closer to the yellow "cool" section, offering at-a-glance checking of the heat status.

 The front-mounted digital control panel also provides a simple on/off button and programmable controls for selecting from four pre-set time settings. Push the "select" button to choose from 4 or 6 hours on high heat or 8 or 10 hours on low heat. 

After the selected cooking time has elapsed, the cooker automatically switches over to keep-warm mode. A digital display shows the time remaining when in cook mode and provides a count-up timer when in keep-warm mode.

Meals stay securely contained during transport. Oversized handles for safely carrying the cooker.  The SCCPCTS605-S will keep food safe while on-the-go with hinged locking lid and carrying handles. The tempered-glass lid uses a rubber gasket to create an extra seal to ensure mess-free transport. With these features, there’s no need to repack food in other containers, making travel a breeze. This slow cooker also has removable oval stoneware that can double as a serving dish. 

 Large, integrated, loop side handles on the heating base help ensure a secure grip when transporting the slow cooker, while onboard cord storage keeps things neat and tidy. A stay-cool loop handle on the lid allows for easy removal when serving.Housed in brushed stainless steel with black accents, the attractive slow cooker makes an elegant choice for any social gathering. 

The unit measures approximately 16 by 10-1/5 by 16 inches and carries a one-year limited warranty. A user manual comes included, and both the removable stoneware and locking lid clean up easily by hand or in the dishwasher.

*Compared to Crock-Pot 6-quart Cook & Carry slow cookers
feature_bullets: 6-quart capacity is perfect for 7 or more people or a 6-pound roast
Shifts to warm setting automatically once the cook time is complete
HeatSaver stoneware maintains optimal serving temperature even without a power source
Travel temperature gauge provides visual feedback on food temperature in the stoneware once cooking is complete
Easy-to-use locking lid featuring lid gasket provides extra seal for less mess on-the-go
